FirstSection.menuDescription1: Enjoy authentic Kyoto sushi, premium Japanese cuisine and choose from 6000+ alcoholic drinks. Our menu offers traditional Japanese dishes and exclusive collectible beverages for true connoisseurs.
FirstSection.menuDescription2: Our chefs are trained in traditional Japanese techniques and use only the freshest ingredients. We also offer catering services and team lunch for special events!
FirstSection.drinksDescription1: Our shop offers a wide range of alcoholic beverages - from fine wines to rare and exclusive spirits. You'll find well-known brands and limited editions to suit all tastes.
FirstSection.drinksDescription2: Whether it's a celebration, a gift or a night out with friends - our quality, affordable drinks will make any moment special. There's something to suit everyone!

SecondSection.khinkaliTitle: Khinkali - Georgian traditions and flavors that enchant
SecondSection.khinkaliDescription: Georgian cuisine amazes with its richness of flavors, and khinkali is its true gem. This juicy, flavorful dish with tender meat broth provides unforgettable gastronomic pleasure. Accompanied by the right wine - fresh fruit, white or red - they reveal the depth of their flavors. Get to know the traditions of Georgian cuisine and enjoy every appetizing bite.
SecondSection.wineTitle: Discover the world of wine: The perfect choice for any dish
SecondSection.wineDescription: Our wine store offers you an exceptional opportunity to find the perfect drink for any meal. Whether you are planning a night out with friends or a romantic dinner, we have something for every taste and occasion. Our carefully selected wines and spirits include the world's finest varieties, perfectly matched to your preferences. Our experienced professionals are always ready to help you make the right choice to create the perfect tasting experience and festive atmosphere.
SecondSection.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag

Footer.restaurantDescription: There is a moment before the knife touches the fish. A breathless second. A stillness older than the ocean. That is where we begin. Taste is only the echo.

404.subtitle2: Perhaps you were looking for something from our menu?

AboutUs.subtitle: Authentic Sushi Restaurant
AboutUs.description: We offer a modern take on Japanese cuisine, combining classic techniques with a signature approach. Our menu features a variety of small and main dishes, a full-service sushi bar with nigiri, sashimi, and rolls, as well as carefully selected cocktails and beverages. We work with trusted suppliers to ensure that only the freshest seafood and high-quality ingredients are served to our guests. Our team of chefs strives to create not just food, but a complete gastronomic experience — balanced, beautiful, and memorable.
AboutUs.experience: Masters with many years of experience
AboutUs.menuTitle: A place where refined taste meets the true art of Japanese cuisine
AboutUs.menuDescription: We offer a carefully curated selection of sushi and sashimi, made with the freshest ingredients. Every piece is a reflection of our chefs' expertise — for them, cooking is not just a craft, but a true art form. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of elegance, comfort, and impeccable service. With us, you'll discover the authentic taste of Japan — refined, balanced, and unforgettable.
AboutUs.alcoholDescription: Enhance your experience with our exclusive selection of rare vintages, collectible bottles, and premium spirits from around the world. From refined classics to bold, limited-edition finds — each bottle is carefully selected to complement the delicate balance of Japanese cuisine
AboutUs.cateringDescriptionOne: Turn your event into a memorable culinary experience. Maitsev Gruusia offers professional catering with a focus on Japanese cuisine — fresh sushi, bowls, appetizers, and signature dishes.
AboutUs.cateringDescriptionTwo: Perfect for private celebrations, weddings, corporate events, and product launches. We deliver on time, present everything beautifully, and can provide on-site service if needed.
AboutUs.cateringDescriptionThree: Delicious, organized, and stress-free — you enjoy the moment, we handle the food.
AboutUs.teamLunchTitle: From Maitsev Gruusia to your workspace
AboutUs.teamLunchDescriptionOne: A great meal brings people together — even on the busiest workdays. Our Team Lunch service is designed for companies, co-working spaces, small teams, and remote professionals who want high-quality Japanese food delivered with zero hassle.
AboutUs.teamLunchDescriptionTwo: We offer a rotating menu of fresh sushi, warm bowls, and healthy sides — all crafted with care and delivered on time. Whether it's a one-off lunch, a weekly team ritual, or fuel for crunch time — we keep your team satisfied, energized, and focused.
AboutUs.authenticFlavors: Authentic flavors. Elevated technique. Unforgettable moments.
AboutUs.selectionDescription: Our selection goes far beyond labels — we source directly from distilleries, cellars, and vineyards where craftsmanship still matters. Each bottle is chosen not just for name, but for character: aged casks from Kyoto, small-run gin from mountain distillers, limited-edition blends with real lineage. We work with trusted suppliers and private allocations to bring in spirits that rarely leave their region — let alone end up behind a bar. From single malt to junmai daiginjo, everything is selected with one idea in mind: serve only what deserves to be served. You won't see pages of choices. Just a refined, evolving list of spirits we believe in — no compromises, no crowd-pleasers. Only precision, rarity, and taste that speaks.

CategorySlider.menuDescription: We offer a carefully curated selection of sushi and sashimi, made with the freshest ingredients. Every piece is a reflection of our chefs’ expertise — for them, cooking is not just a craft, but a true art form. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of elegance, comfort, and impeccable service. With us, you’ll discover the authentic taste of Japan — refined, balanced, and unforgettable.

Maitsev Gruusia offers professional catering with a focus on Japanese cuisine — fresh sushi, bowls, appetizers, and signature dishes. Perfect for private celebrations, weddings, corporate events, and product launches. We deliver on time, present everything beautifully, and can provide on-site service if needed. Tasty, well-organized, and stress-free — you enjoy the moment, we take care of the food.
CategorySlider.teamLunchTitle: From Maitsev Gruusia to your workspace
CategorySlider.teamLunchDescriptionOne: At Maitsev Gruusia, we believe that a great meal can bring people together — even during the busiest workdays. Our Team Lunches service is designed for companies, co-working spaces, small teams, and remote professionals who want to enjoy high-quality Japanese food without breaking focus.
CategorySlider.teamLunchDescriptionTwo: We offer a rotating menu of fresh sushi, warm bowls, and healthy sides, all crafted with care and delivered on time. Whether it’s a one-time lunch meeting, a weekly team tradition, or fuel for an intense deadline, we make sure your crew stays satisfied, energized, and inspired.

OrderPage.title: Exceptional Delivery Service
OrderPage.subtitle: Enjoy culinary masterpieces and exquisite alcohol from the comfort of your home with our premium service
OrderPage.step1Description: Start your gastronomic experience with a simple order
OrderPage.step2Description: We'll bring your order with special attention to details
OrderPage.step2Detail1: Express delivery in 60 minutes (for alcohol order up to 7 days)
OrderPage.ctaText: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who have already appreciated our service

CateringPage.heroSubtitle: Authentic Japanese cuisine delivered with precision and elegance. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations.
CateringPage.corporateDescription: Professional catering for business meetings, conferences, and team events
CateringPage.privateDescription: Elegant catering for weddings, anniversaries, and special occasions
CateringPage.specialDescription: Tailored catering solutions for product launches and exclusive gatherings
CateringPage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our catering services
CateringPage.faq1Question: What types of events do you cater?
CateringPage.faq1Answer: We cater corporate events, weddings, private parties, product launches, and any special occasion. Our team can customize the menu and service to match your specific needs.
CateringPage.faq2Question: How far in advance should I book?
CateringPage.faq2Answer: We recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance for smaller events. For larger events or weddings, we suggest 1-2 weeks notice to ensure availability and proper preparation.
CateringPage.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer full-service catering with professional serving staff, including chefs who can prepare sushi on-site for an authentic experience.
CateringPage.faq4Question: What's included in your catering packages?
CateringPage.faq4Answer: Our packages include food preparation, delivery, setup, serving equipment, and cleanup. We can also provide beverages, decorations, and additional staff upon request.
CateringPage.faq5Answer: Absolutely! We work with vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary requirements. Please inform us of any restrictions when booking.
CateringPage.ctaText: Let us handle the food while you focus on what matters most - your guests and the perfect moment.
CateringPage.teamLunchDescription: Daily office meals and custom lunch boxes for your team. Fresh sushi, warm bowls, and healthy sides delivered on time.

LoadingScreen.logoSubtext: An exciting gastronomic journey through Georgia in the heart of Tallinn
LoadingScreen.atmosphereSubtitle: Immerse yourself in authentic Georgian atmosphere
LoadingScreen.atmosphereDescription: Let the spirit of Georgia accompany you on this culinary adventure through centuries of flavors and traditions. Feel the warmth of Georgian hospitality in every dish.
